column4: After doing an upgrade (do-release-upgrade) GRUB is not loading, help!
Boot a live CD and run sudo update-grub
we are seeing a crazy screen
after do-upgrade-release, GRUB screen is shown
boot a live CD and run sudo update-grub
based on a picture sent from remote
a screenshot from our VPS provider: http://oi51.tinypic.com/156bgyb.jpg
Why many time do I have to tell you to boot a live CD
IDK what to tell you.  Additionally, you version of Ubuntu looks very out of date
i just did a do-release-upgrade to natty
no no,  I mean.  It's not old.  To fix the problem you must boot a live CD
